name: Jesse Antoszyk
description: Jesse is a Solutions Architect at Codefresh. He enjoys leveraging automation and Kubernetes to solve problems. Prior to Codefresh, Jesse worked as a consultant, helping clients adopt DevSecOps practices and tools.
